description:
As of the time of this market's inception, April 14, 2022, Parag Agrawal is the chief executive officer (CEO) of Twitter, Inc. - an American social media company providing a popular online platform for microblogging and social networking.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Parag Agrawal remains CEO of Twitter from the date of this market's inception, April 14, 2022 to June 30, 2022, 12 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

An announcement that Parag Agrawal will no longer be CEO on or before June 30 will not be sufficient to resolve this market. Only confirmation that Parag Agrawal is no longer CEO of Twitter within the market timeframe will result in this market resolving to "No".

This market will resolve according to official press releases from Twitter as well as the information in their 'About' sections: https://investor.twitterinc.com/corporate-governance/board-of-directors/default.aspx, https://about.twitter.com/en/who-we-are/our-company. A consensus of credible media sources will also suffice.

events.title: Will Parag Agrawal remain CEO of Twitter through June 30?

question: Will Parag Agrawal remain CEO of Twitter through June 30?
